title: After opting for science, I can't understand what I should do. I am not interested in the medical field nor in engineering, but I am interested in a tech-related field. What should I do after 12th? - Quora

response.answer_text: I suggest you do a diploma in any area of your interest. It is surprising that you like tech related field but do not want to be an engineer. Perhaps you are a practical person who does not like academic learning. But some book learning is useful if want to succeed in making practical contributions. Learning only as a apprentice may not be sufficient
